LanguageData.VV_PlantGatherCooldownInspectorString: Time remaining until the next gather is possible: {0}
LanguageData.VV_GizmoViviEggProgressTooltip: Indicates how much time is left until the next egg is laid.\n\nIf the progress is at 100% and there is a suitable Vivi hatchery for laying, it will go there to lay an egg.
LanguageData.VV_InspectorViviGerminatorManageLastPeri: Time remaining until next manage job: {0}
LanguageData.VV_CommandFertilizeAutoActivatedDesc: When the plant's energy is below a certain level, the colonists set whether to automatically use fertilizer.
LanguageData.VV_CommandSetFertilizeAutoThresholdDesc: Set the threshold energy to determine whether to use fertilizer. If the energy is below the threshold, the colonists use fertilizer to the maximum.
LanguageData.VV_CommandRegisterGerminateScheduleDesc: Enter the manage schedule for germinating seeds and start germinating.
LanguageData.VV_CommandCancelGerminateScheduleDesc: Cancel the currently scheduled or ongoing seed germinating operation.
LanguageData.VV_CommandCanWithdrawProductDesc: Decide whether to proceed with the packaging of the seedlings that have been germinated.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_Energy_Desc: This is the maximum amount of energy that plants can store.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_EnergyFlux_Desc: This is the amount of energy change of this plant over the course of a day. \nEnergy can be produced by certain ancient plants when fertilizer is applied or the right environment is in place, and is not consumed when packaged. \nAncient plants whose energy production exceeds their reserves provide excess energy to other ancient plants in the immediate vicinity.
LanguageData.VV_MessageAncientTerminalWorldtreeDiscov: Found an ancient terminal with information about the ancient worldtree!
